feels.name: Love
feels.quote: Fred was certainly very fond of his mother.

feels.name: Submission
feels.quote: Fred was stung, and released her hand.

feels.name: Optimism
feels.quote: Fred was not utterly in despair.
feels.exactPlace: After receiving money from Mr. Featherstone

feels.name: Remorse
feels.quote: Fred was sulkily, taking up his hat and whip.

feels.name: Love
feels.quote: She doted on her eldest son and her youngest girl.

feels.name: Contempt
feels.quote: Mary was treating him with more indifference than usual.

feels.name: Vigilance
feels.quote: Mary sat down again, and resumed her work.
feels.exactPlace: After Fred's attempt to engage her

feels.name: Sarcasm
feels.quote: Mary looked up with some roguishness at Fred.

feels.name: Passion
feels.quote: From that hour Lydgate felt the growth of an intellectual passion.
feels.exactPlace: After reading about the valves of the heart

feels.name: Curiosity
feels.quote: He was a quick fellow, and when hot from play, would toss himself in a corner, and in five minutes be deep in any sort of book that he could lay his hands on.

feels.name: Disappointment
feels.quote: He was not pre-eminent in them.

feels.name: Excitement
feels.quote: He was a vigorous animal with a ready understanding.
